text: Longuefuye is a former commune of 274 people (1999). It is found in the region Pays de la Loire in the Mayenne department in the northwest of France. On 1 January 2019, it was merged into the new commune of Gennes-Longuefuye.Arrêté préfectoral 14 November 2018 == References == Category:Former communes in Mayenne
title: Longuefuye
